item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 10, 2024 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Willow, Our Quantum Chip (711 points | 319 comments)

4. Starlink's first constellation of direct-to-phone satellites is now in orbit (56 points | 18 comments)

6. New dog, old trick: DaMAgeCard attack targets memory directly via SD card reader (96 points | 9 comments)
7. Xylella Fastidiosa: A crisis brewing in Europe's olive groves (34 points | 13 comments)
8. LLM abstraction levels inspired by fish eye lens (58 points | 7 comments)
9. GPS constellation as a way to image the ionosphere (2011) (10 points | 4 comments)
10. Debanking (and Debunking?) (16 points | discuss)
11. Software developer arrested in connection with murder of healthcare executive (247 points | 415 comments)

14. Task-specific LLM evals that do and don't work (120 points | 31 comments)

23. Kafka's Screwball Tragedy: Investigations of a Philosophical Dog (66 points | 8 comments)
24. Fire risk assessment of battery home storage compared to general house fires (72 points | 67 comments)
25. El Salvador to scale back Bitcoin dreams to seal $1.3B IMF deal (10 points | 1 comment)
26. God Plays Chess (2018) (46 points | 25 comments)
27. MagiskSSH – SSH server on Android without Termux (97 points | 61 comments)
28. Mystery 'Disease X' outbreak widens as WHO sends rapid response team to DR Congo (52 points | 19 comments)
29. I made a satellite ion thruster [video] (34 points | 7 comments)
30. True Crime: Allan Pinkerton's Thirty Years a Detective (1884) (45 points | 9 comments)
